程序包 org.bupt.persosnalfinance.Back.Service

接口 BudgetService

所有已知实现类:
BudgetServiceImpl
@Service public interface BudgetService
BudgetService is a service interface for performing budget-related calculations. Responsibilities: - Define a method for checking overspending based on user data and a threshold.
